publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7078 Bill Kidd: Another Successful Year for Dumbarton Road Corridor Addiction Forumâ€”That the Parliament offers its congratulations to Dumbarton Road Corridor (DRC) Addiction Forum on what it considers another successful year of activity and the publication of its 2009-10 annual report; welcomes that the forum was one of many organisations across Scotland increasing opportunities for young people to benefit from Scottish Government CashBack for Communities funds; further congratulates the DRC Addiction Forum Peer Educators on winning the Evening Times Community Championship Award in the last year; commends all the volunteers and staff for their dedication and hard work in making a real difference to the lives of DRC Addiction Forum service users, and wishes them all continuing success in the coming year and beyond.
